name: Gift of Life: Key of Solomon
name_original: Gift of Life: Key of Solomon
description:
In Damascus the ancient manuscripts written about the existence of a mysterious tomb of the great king Solomon in Jerusalem area. For many years they tried to find her, but not for the sake of interest, and in order to win the heart of the tomb – the Key of Solomon, an ancient grimoire containing descriptions of magical spells to call demons and various magical recipes.
Attempts to find and open the tomb year after year, was crowned with failure, but in any story, there are coups.
Will the friends survive all the things that they have to go through? Will they be able to reach the coveted goal while maintaining sanity?

Remember, you have to do everything to stay alive. Avoid deadly traps and evil spirits. Open chests, smash vases and find valuable objects.
First aid kit - an indispensable companion in your difficult task. Collect all the souls, relics and grimoires in this cursed place and pass his last test. Look into the eyes of the real evil, but get to your goal.

-multiple story endings
-control two heroes
-hardcore levels
-mystical story
-different puzzles
-a real test of your abilities
